model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
    A class modelling the Game controller of a game of spectrangle.
    Author:
    PMBos

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int preference,
            Controller cont)
        Creates a new Game instance with the given id. Creating a new Board and Bag.
        Parameters:
        preference - the preference of the entire game.
        cont - the controller to sue as an observer.

        Returns:

        a copy of the Board being used for the game.

      • getBag

        public Bag getBag()
        Returns:
        the Bag used in this game.

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Determines if a game is over. Conditions for a game over are: a) the board is full. b) the board is not full, but no player can make another move.
        Returns:
        true if the game is over, false otherwise.

      • isValidRotation

        public boolean isValidRotation(int rotation)
        Checks if the rotation specified is valid.
        Parameters:
        rotation - the rotation to check.
        Returns:
        true if the rotation is valid, false otherwise.

      • getVictor

        public Player getVictor()
        Finds the victor of the game.
        Returns:
        the Player that won the game.

      • addPlayer

        public void addPlayer(Player player)
        Adds the given player to the list of players participating in this game.
        Parameters:
        player - the player to add.

      • attemptMove

        public void attemptMove(Tile tile,
                        int index,
                        int rotation)
                 throws IllegalMove
        Attempts to move the given tile to the given index. An attempt succeeds if: The index is valid. The tile is valid. The rotation is valid. The move is valid.
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile to move.
        index - the index to move the tile to. Throws an Exception if the attempt failed.
        rotation - the rotation of the tile to attempt.
        Throws:
        IllegalMove - when the move is not legal.

      • exchangeTile

        public void exchangeTile(Tile tile)
        Removes the given tile from the players hand and gives him a new one.
        Parameters:
        tile - the tile to exchange.
